section_1.title: Unsolicited application
section_1.content: You are interested to join us but none of our online offers meet your expectations Don't worry, we analyze all applications and provide a personalized response

section_2.title: CV Vid√©o
section_2.content: Some tips for recording a video for application:

section_3.descreption: Sit down in a quiet place
Share with us clearly your project and your expertise in a clear and simple way
Tell us how you think you contribute positively by joining our team our team
Please tell us about your availability, as well as your work rhythm
